carpet.rule.Fixlongoverflow.name: Fix Entity X Coordinate Crash
carpet.rule.Fixlongoverflow.desc: Fixing the issue where retrieving the entity's x-coordinate value within the range [33554414.0, 33554434.0) causes the game to crash with an IllegalArgumentException.
carpet.rule.MinecartMotionFix.name: 重新引入1.21矿车跨纬度传递动量
carpet.rule.MinecartMotionFix.desc: 移植1.21-1.21.1版本中矿车携带乘客跨纬度会在传送tick给予乘客矿车的动量到1.21.2以上版本
